column4: I did a fresh install of ubuntu 10.04 server (first install) with ubuntu-desktop added via apt-get, and my mouse is not functioning properly. i tried cat /dev/input/mouse and it works on there. i did another fresh install with kde instead of gdm with the same problem. anyone know what the problem could be?
is it not functioning at all or wonky
it's not really a concern since it's a server so I'll just configure it and leave it, but I'm quite curious if anyone may know what would cause that
is there a console app to mess with power management? i just have minimal gui apps
